Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates

Class AbstractClientState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates.AbstractClientState
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAskGodFromListClientState, AbstractAskGodsFromListClientState, AbstractAskStartPlayerClientState, AbstractConnectToServerClientState, AbstractDisconnectClientState, AbstractInGameClientState, AbstractJoinLobbyClientState, AbstractLoseGameClientState, AbstractSetNicknameClientState, AbstractSetPlayersCountClientState, AbstractShowGamePassiveClientState, AbstractWaitPlayersClientState, AbstractWelcomeScreenState, AbstractWinGameClientState
public abstract class AbstractClientState
extends java.lang.Object
A generic Client state, to be extended by each state.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public abstract void setup()
      Triggers the operations to perform when entering the current state.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Triggers the operations to perform when exiting the current state

    • render

      public abstract void render()
      Function called by the main thread that renders the current state to the UI. This function is the only one of this class allowed to be synchronous with the user input.

    • notifyUiInteraction

      public abstract void notifyUiInteraction()
      Function called by the UI after the user has provided his/her inputs.

    • triggerRender

      public void triggerRender()
      Requests a UI render.

    • handleServerMessage

      public boolean handleServerMessage​(ServerMessage message)
      Handles a message received from the server.
      Parameters:
      message - the message from the server
      Returns:
      true if the message has been handled by the current state

    • handleClientError

      public void handleClientError()
      Handles a CLIENT_ERROR StatusMessage sent by the server.
      Throws:
      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if CLIENT_ERROR is not a valid StatusMessage for the current state

    • handleContinue

      public void handleContinue()
      Handles a CONTINUE StatusMessage sent by the server.
      Throws:
      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if CONTINUE is not a valid StatusMessage for the current state

    • handleOk

      public void handleOk()
      Handles a OK StatusMessage sent by the server.
      Throws:
      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if OK is not a valid StatusMessage for the current state

      Handles a TEAPOT StatusMessage sent by the server.

      Handles a SERVER_ERROR StatusMessage sent by the server.
